about.title: About
about.description: Graduated from Providence University with a degree in Data Science and Big Data Analytics and Applications. He is good at front-end technology and is familiar with using Vue.js framework and Git moderation to develop websites. In the back-end, I also use Nodjs with egg to connect RestfulAPI, and I have also used Django to develop LineBot.
